The movie has a great mix of humor and action, and it's a lot of fun to watch.

If that doesn't quite strike your fancy, I think you might enjoy "Mr. & Mrs. Smith" instead. It's an action-packed romantic comedy with Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt as a married couple who are secretly assassins trying to kill each other. The movie has a great balance of humor, action, and romance, and it's a lot of fun to watch.
